title: Effect of swimming on the muscle fibre type transitions in skeletal muscles of rats with colon carcinoma

author: Vika Smerdu, Faculty of Medicine, University of Ljubljana

segmentation: I'm going to present to the effect of swimming on a skeletal muscles of rat in which: carcinoma was experimentally induced.
First, since most of you are not familiar with skeletal muscles with short introduction.
So the functional characteristic of skeletal muscles are related to fiber types of which skeletal muscles are composed.

Initially, fiber types were divided in slow twitch, or they call them also read because of high content of myoglobin and too fast, which white fibers which are more about where are more about, didn't in slow, fast contracting muscles.
So later it was found that mildly heavy chain isoforms part of miles in molecule, which is the main contractile protein apart of acting, are responsible for fiber type characteristic.
So in Redsnow are known for major fiber types as you see in slow twitch fibers so.
Where is the pointer in slow twitch fiber smiling?
Have a chain.
One is express any fast fibers.
Three isoforms are expressed in rats to a 2X and to be the speed of contraction of these fiber types increases from type one to type to be.
So the lead late letter being the fastest fiber type.
2B fibers are not expressed just for.
Information are not expressed in human skeletal muscles and not even not in Doc and even in some other large mammals, but they are expressed in porcien skeletal muscles.
Beside this pure fiber fiber types, there are also hybrid fibers which are expressing two mostly 2, sometimes even more miles in heavy chain isoforms.
Usually they up, sorry.
Co Express the neighboring eyes of forms and you see these are the most common hybrid fibers.
More rare combinations are also possible, but are as I said, fairly found.

However, skeletal muscle has the ability which is called muscle plasticity, which enables the muscle to adapt to change physiological demands by switch of meising heavy chain gene expression, which is then reflected as fiber type transition.
It is believed that fiber type transition proceed gradually following the so called rule of the next neighbor.
So true Co expression of neighboring isoforms.

But since Fibers Co expressing combination of miles in isoforms which are not consistent with this stepwise rule were found, it is believed that in certain condition even more direct fiber type transition can occur, occur and you can find also fibers to expressing slow and the fastest to be.
Mising having chain isoform.
Oh it is known that hyperthyroidism reduced weight bearing and reduced neuromuscular activity can induce slow to fast fiber type transition.
On the contrary, hyperthyroidism and chronic overloading increased neuromuscular activity induced fast to slow fiber type transitions.
In our study we we look how the swimming influence fiber type transitions in rats in which: carcinoma was induced by application of the material hydrazine.
Actually, this animals were offered from colleague Martina per share who performed with her coworkers other study and she offered me to study.
The effect of swimming and other factors.
This study is still in process on fiber to skeletal muscles.
So four week old rats.
Wistar rats were divided randomly in two groups.
Now swimmers and swimmers.
The swimming was performed during dark face of of the day and during swimming.
The non swimmers were exposed to what water to exclude, possible stress and other effects on the animals so for.
So to adapt to adapt to water exposure and to swimming, both groups were gradually introduced to these factors for a period of eight weeks.
Here below you can see.

The swimming was gradually prolonged till 9th week when the rats were swimming 90 minutes a day for five days a week, and the swimming lasted 21 weeks from the night wink on the both groups received one application of the material hydrazine Selena Week till end of the 15 week.
After it, after Nezha well, the of course the experimental protocol was approved by National Ethic Committee.
Here you see the license number.

And after a tenacious slow solos, muscle, extensor digitorum longus and deep red part and superficial white part of gastrocnemius, medialis and gastrocnemius lateralus muscle muscles were excited and frozen being liquid nitrogen and stored at minus 80 till process for immunohistochemistry.
These are all muscles from Hindley.
Of animals.

So the methods we demonstrated miles in heavy chains, isoforms serial prior sections using immuno histo chemistry with monoclonal antibodies specific to my Zing heavy chain isoforms and fiber type composition percentages of masa of masses were assessed with computer assisted system for image analysis that was developed in our Institute in collaboration with check colleagues.
Here you have for example soloes muscle sections immunohistochemistry of solar on solos.
Muscle sections of non swimmers and swimmers.
As I said, the solos muscle is mostly composed of slow fibers, those dark fibers and these are few type 2A fibers and here is 1 hybrid, one to a fiber.
Sometime in the past these fibers were called type to see.
We notice that in solos muscle, though in most of other muscles there were no significant changes except of solo swap muscles.
In swimmers, where the percentage of fast type 2A fibers increased significantly.
And of course that of Type 2 top of type one significantly decrease.
Least here we have.
Presentation of fiber type composition in blue of non swimmers and yellow in swimmers.
So we see that in solos there were significant increase of type one fibers and decrease of tattoo.
A 5% decrease of type One fibers.
So we assume that there was a tendency of slow towards fast fiber type transformation in EDL muscle.
There were no significant significant changes.
So.

Though the percentage of hybrid fibers increased usage percentage of two weeks, X slightly decreased, so according to the fibers of percentages of fiber with fibers, we assume that there was bidirectional fiber type transition.
This red portion of gastrocnemius, medialis, and white portion faster slow transition was notice in the red portion.
The transition went from type 2B to Type 1, where is in the white portion.
The transitions were just among fast fiber types.
Here are all hybrid fibers pulled together.
Uh.
In white in gastrocnemius, lateralus, in the red portion, there was a tendency of bidirectional transitions, but in the white portion there was fast to slow transition.
Of course, all the changes were quite minimal.
There were quite variable results or inside the animal groups.
Uh, so.
So we conclude the 20 week one week swimming induced only moderate fibertech transitions except of solos, muscle in which significant transition from slow towards fast was notice.
What is not in accordance with the para digam that in during endurance training induces faster slow fiber tight transitions.
But we found even in literature.
Very contradictory results about fiber type transitions in this muscle.
So.

We conclude that direction and extent of fiber type transitions was probably related to initial basic, genetically determined fiber type of fiber type composition of individual muscles, and probably even today a role in swimming.
So we assume that a longer, lasting and perhaps even more intensive training would be necessary to induce more relevant fiber type transitions in these muscles.
That would be in short.
Thank you very much.
